title: Lesson 06 - One Minute German
description: In lesson 6 of One Minute German you will learn how to introduce yourself. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
content:encoded: In lesson 6 of One Minute German you will learn how to introduce yourself. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
itunes:subtitle: Learn how to introduce yourself
